name: Hidden Code
description:
you are in a lab, the thing you were experementing on has escaped. even though its invisible you can use your phone to see it.  also,  there is a lock on the exit! the code is invisible. you have to escape while avoiding the monster to win. good luck! :)

PS, if you run out of battery use the charging point (you will know when you see one it has a blue glow, click it 50 times to get full charge from 0%)

WASD to move.

MOUSE to look.

Left Mouse To Interact.  

Space to use the phone.

Shift to run.

Ctrl to crouch.
